I'm not seeding this and am about to dump it from my files, as it seems to be missing vital audio portions-really sucks when you're all set up but can't hear someone open the door & walk up to you...the first sign of shit going down is the occasional shadow or the sound of gunfire going off right behind your head-if anyone else managed to get FULL sound I'll hold off for a bit, to see any suggestions but otherwise I say don't bother here-get a COMPLETE version.

'Kay, I've been paying GameTap to play this, and had the same sound issue-1st I was pissed 'cause the paid service seemed to screw up...then I felt somewhat embarrassed when I realized I'd been retarded enough to look for a solution everywhere but the in-game menu-Damn! If you seem to get SOME sounds, but NO footsteps, door noises, Etc.-check out the 
"Use Hardware" box somewhere in the in-game menu, shut it off & you should be fine (might've fu**ed up the name "Use/Enable", but "Hardware" is definite - it's a check-box). As for FruKtaH's elevator issue, quite a few people can't quite get the hang of the menus that are seemingly only used by R-clk'ing, or rolling the mouse wheel...that should allow you to use the control panel's "floor switch" and choose a higher/lower floor. I had a few issues w/ GameTap's Vers. freezing my character in place if he was moving while the doors shut-if I stood still and proceeded after they'd closed, no problem...weird!

BTW-Can I get some seed so I can see if I was just being dumb, after all? I remember the only problem I had was the partial sound loss (resulting from that  "Hardware" option via the in-game menu), and now I know how to avoid it (I think). Please seed me, I LOVE this one the best (out of the series)!!!
